Process: Inbound 311 call triage and information provision via multilingual AI voice
Intended Outcome: Expand language access; reduce handle/wait times; improve first-contact resolution during 21-day pilot
Observed Results: Pilot completed (21 days); outcomes not disclosed in report
Source Title: NYC 2024 Algorithmic Tools Report (includes NYC311 AI Voice pilot)

Organization: California Department of Tax and Fee Administration (CDTFA)
Process: Taxpayer call center knowledge retrieval & draft response generation
Integration Depth: Assistive drafting & retrieval over agency knowledge base
Intended Outcome: Shorten research time; decrease taxpayer wait times; improve ops monitoring
Observed Results: In testing; metrics not yet published

Process: Health facility inspection report drafting & citation linking
Integration Depth: Assistive drafting; policy linkages; HITL review
Intended Outcome: Reduce report drafting time; improve consistency; increase inspector time on investigations
Observed Results: In testing; metrics not yet published
Source Title: Health care facility inspections project | GenAI (CA)

Process: Colonoscopy assistance (adenoma detection) using FDA-cleared CV devices
Intended Outcome: Increase adenoma detection rate (ADR) and cancer prevention
Observed Results: 21% increase in odds of adenoma detection; ~+4% absolute ADR vs. without AI
Source Title: VA AI Use Case Inventory (public site + bulk inventory)

Process: Expedited appeals (involuntary commitments): AI transcription & workflow changes
Intended Outcome: Reduce time from notice of appeal to opinion for mental-health appeals
Observed Results: Average cycle time reduced from 143.3 days (2023 baseline) to 30.85 days for first 6 months (7 cases)
Source Title: Indiana courts article: Involuntary Commitments, AI & Expedited Appeals

Organization: Nevada DETR (Unemployment) & NV Health Insurance Helpline
Process: UI appeals assistance; virtual agent for health insurance call center
Intended Outcome: Speed appeals processing; reduce caller wait times
Observed Results: Article reports reduced waiting times for health insurance callers; quantitative metrics not disclosed
Source Title: Nevada agencies eye AI to speed jobless claims, DMV queries

Process: Mission workflows enhanced via 3 GenAI pilots (per AI Roadmap)
Intended Outcome: Evaluate GenAI impact on mission-specific tasks safely and effectively
Observed Results: Phase 1 pilots completed; outcomes not yet public
Source Title: DHS Fact Sheet: Completes first phase of AI pilots; hires AI Corps

Process: Portfolio of genAI projects in teaching, research, and admin workflows
Intended Outcome: Accelerate course design, student support, and knowledge workflows
Observed Results: Showcase of projects; metrics not consolidated
Source Title: AI-powered educational experiences underway at ASU

Process: Canvas-integrated custom AI tutors and campus AI services
Intended Outcome: Streamline creation of course-specific AI tutors; improve access to course knowledge
Observed Results: Integration live; qualitative faculty uptake reported
Source Title: Fall 2024 Enhancements to Maizey AI (Canvas integration)

Integration Depth: Operational apps integrated into mission workflows
Intended Outcome: Scale AI-enabled battlespace awareness, joint fires, logistics
Observed Results: Contract expansion to support multi-service deployment
Source Title: Palantir: Expands Maven Smart System AI/ML capabilities

Process: AI-backed stroke imaging triage across 100+ stroke centres
Integration Depth: Decision support embedded in care pathway
Intended Outcome: Reduce door-to-treatment time; improve functional recovery rates
Observed Results: Treatment time reduced 140_79 minutes; % with no/slight disability rose 16%_48%
Source Title: NHS rollout of AI stroke tool (press coverage)

Process: Disaster assistance triage via 'Clara' chatbot to guide survivors
Intended Outcome: Direct survivors to appropriate assistance faster; reduce call centre load
Source Title: American Red Cross: Meet Clara, the Disaster Response Chatbot
